Articles.Content: Hey, I don't really want the other features that come with MechJeb so I'd like to ask if there is a standalone landing autopilot mod where you point where you want to land or if MechJeb can be configured to do that.

I can of course state the obvious to simple not use the unwanted features . However some 'over sensitive' people might find that condescending so I will not suggest that.

There is however an even better solution: disable unwanted modules. [url]http://wiki.mechjeb.com/index.php?title=Manual/Blacklisting_modules[/url] Edited November 21, 2015 by Tex_NL

I highly recommend Kramax Autopilot. It hasn’t been recompiled for 1.0.5 yet, but works just fine (I had it land me twice today) and comes with landing patterns built in.
